reviewText: I could never get enough of Richard!

If you love Richard Simmons and his other workouts you will love this one. He really makes you love streching. If you do much workout of any kind then you should buy (and try) this. Your body will love you for it...

I have used Richards tapes for years and was so sorry to hear they are not available via DVD.  My old tape finally broke and I was really upset so I tired Amazon and was wonderfully surprised that I found another "used".  It arrived in fine shape, no band which I guess is understandable.
